TopicTitle: Make a wish... and have it horribly corrupted!

Articles.Content:
granted, hes also an alien and cant communicate with humans

i wish i had a F-35

Granted. No way to corrupt this, it's already awful.

I wish for a permanent, real, licensed, non-injured, reusable, living, human, cheap lawyer, who is good at law, can win cases, and get me money back while making me look good.

Granted, he is capable of doing all those things. That doesn't mean he WOULD though. It will be almost impossible for you to persuade him.

I wish for some dung.

Granted. It's dung.

I wish for a power surge in the server if the unwanted 3rd party mod hosting site.

Granted, but the 3rd party site has a virus and it spreads to the server, destroying your computer forever.

I wish for a hypercomputer.

granted, but you can never get it to stay in one place, let alone get it to do what you want it to.

I wish I was the boss of my boss instead of the other way around

Granted, everyone quits, and you go bankrupt.

I wish for snacks.

Granted, everyone quits, and you go bankrupt.

I wish for snacks.

Granted. They are chocolate covered grasshoppers.

I wish for Jeb.

Granted, you are now homeless as Jeb just got a new VAB.

I wish to be able to change anything (I can change the corruptness/bad part to not exist).

Granted. You destroy the universe.

I wish an egg flew around my room.

Granted. You destroy the universe.

I wish an egg flew around my room.

Granted. It hit you in the face and you got salmonella.

I wish we had FTL

Too bad only light particles can exceed it.

I wish there was a easy way to go to Laythe.

Granted, Laythe is now the new Eve.

I wish to wishception.

Granted, all the wishes are bad and will make you die painfully

i wish i had a button to explode the universe

Since most of the universe is completely empty, the explosion would only be noticeable as a slight increase in the expansion of universe.

I wish I had a 1280x1280 avatar.

Granted. But everyone else has a 1281x1281 avatar.

I wish for a permanent, real, licensed, non-injured, reusable, living, human, cheap lawyer, who is good at law, will win cases when I ask him to, and get me money back while making me look good.

Granted, but he doesn't speak any of the languages you speak.

i wish for unlimited pizza

Granted. A billion (gee I hope that many don't exist) copies of all FNAF games fall on your house.

I wish I didn't have to go to school.

Granted, you become a homeless bum.

I wish I could use the wishception I asked for earlier, against Dman, so he will stop asking for lawyers

Granted, you become a homeless bum.

I wish I could use the wishception I asked for earlier, against Dman, so he will stop asking for lawyers

Granted. Dman has a million lawers and will sue you for life.

I wish the devs would add clouds.

Granted, they add a feature where clouds will appear in front of your screen so you can't see anything.

I wish America wasn't planning an invasion of Syria/Iran.

Granted, they add a feature where clouds will appear in front of your screen so you can't see anything.

I wish America wasn't planning an invasion of Syria/Iran.

Granted. Australia got tsar nuked.

I wish to live.

Yeah, but you get a critical illness, and seeing as you wish to live, you can't die.

I wish mythological creatures existed.

Granted, but they destroy the world.

I wish for hyperspeed.

Granted, but they destroy the world.

I wish for hyperspeed.

Granted, but you cant stop moving

I Wish for a working kerbal craft
